buildinspeaker: User's voice can be broadcasted via build-in speaker to scare the unvited vistor.
label8: Intergraded PIR detector to provide precise and timely alarm
label9: Built-in CMOS camera and infrared LED . Even in dark environment, camera can get clear images
label7: This product needs to use GSM SIM card. It can send MMS images to MMS enabled mobile phone with a color display or to an e-mail address.
label21: Power adapter input 100V-240V/50Hz output DC 5V Operating temperature -10-+45 degree Store temperature -20-+60 degree Relative humidity 10-90% without condensation Operating frequency EGSM900, GSM1800 Listen-in distance ≤6 meters Detect distance of built-in PIR sensor ≤6 meters (frontal) Wireless signal transmitting distance ≤25 meters (straight line) Image format JPEG Image resolution 160×128, 320×240, 640×480 Camera VGA 300K pixel Viewing angel 68 degree Best viewing distance ≤9 meters (day time)  ≤6 meters (night time) Lithium battery 10 hours
